title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 162.1 - Scope of part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 162.1 - Scope of part

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to establish standards and
approval requirements for eligible agencies seeking to obtain approval of
vocational training programs for purposes of tuition awards to Vietnam, Persian

Gulf, Afghanistan and other eligible combat veterans pursuant to section
669-a
of the

Education Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
162.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
